survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the productivity and challenges faced by employees working remotely, to help organizations improve remote work policies and support.

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work remotely?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify data collection. Ensure options cover all common remote work schedules.

script.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work remotely?

questions.question_text: Which of the following tools do you use daily for remote work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple tool usages. Include an 'Other' option for less common tools.

script.question_text: Which of the following tools do you use daily for remote work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face while working remotely?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to allow respondents to describe challenges in their own words.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face while working remotely?

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall productivity while working remotely compared to working in-office?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale to measure perceived productivity changes.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall productivity while working remotely compared to working in-office?

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would improve your remote work experience?
